0001110010110011 0100010011010110 0 -> sum: 0110000110001001, cout: 0
1110111100100111 1010101001001100 1 -> sum: 1001100101110100, cout: 1
1111111000100110 0001110010000000 0 -> sum: 0001101010100110, cout: 1
0001010001011100 1100100101011100 1 -> sum: 1101110110111001, cout: 0
1001101001000100 0000010011010100 0 -> sum: 1001111100011000, cout: 0
1111011001001100 0001101011100010 0 -> sum: 0001000100101110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
